languages.text: "Таков был их долг. Я более не подходил для роли пилота. Я стал позором для целого рода. То, как со мной обошлись... трудно винить тех, кто потратил годы и годы ритуалов и тренировок на паршивую овцу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс хмурится.{/n} "Таков был их долг. Я более не подходил для роли пилота. Я стал позором для целого рода. То, как со мной обошлись... трудно винить тех, кто потратил годы и годы ритуалов и тренировок на паршивую овцу".

languages.text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."
languages.original_text: "Таков был их долг. Я более не подходил для роли пилота. Я стал позором для целого рода. То, как со мной обошлись... трудно винить тех, кто потратил годы и годы ритуалов и тренировок на паршивую овцу".

traits.locale_text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

"It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

"It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

"It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

languages.text: “这是他们的职责所在，我当时已经不再适合成为驾驶员了。我成了整个家族的耻辱，而他们对待我的方式……我也并不愿意为此责怪他们。他们在我身上花了许多年的心血，让我接受仪式与训练，可我却沦为了害群之马。”
languages.original_text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

traits.locale_text: “这是他们的职责所在，我当时已经不再适合成为飞行员了。我成了整个家族的耻辱，而他们对待我的方式……我也并不愿意为此责怪他们。他们在我身上花了许多年的心血，让我接受仪式与训练，可我却沦为了害群之马。”

languages.text: «Era su obligación. Ya no era apto para ser piloto. Era una vergüenza para todo mi linaje. La forma en la que me trataron... me cuesta condenarles por ello. Habían desperdiciado años y más años de rituales y entrenamiento conmigo, tratando de pulir una manzana podrida».
languages.original_text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

traits.locale_text: «Era su obligación. Ya no era apto para ser piloto. Era una vergüenza para todo mi linaje. La forma en la que me trataron... me cuesta condenarles por ello. Habían desperdiciado años y más años de rituales y entrenamiento conmigo, tratando de pulir una manzana podrida».

languages.text: 「それが彼らの義務だった。俺は、もはやパイロットにふさわしくなかった。俺は一族全体の恥だった。彼らが俺にした仕打ちは…そのことで彼らを非難するつもりはない。彼らは何年も何年も儀式と訓練に費やし、腐ったリンゴを磨いていたのだから」
languages.original_text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

traits.locale_text: 「それが彼らの義務だった。俺は、もはやパイロットにふさわしくなかった。俺は一族全体の恥だった。彼らが俺にした仕打ちは…そのことで彼らを非難するつもりはない。彼らは何年も何年も儀式と訓練に費やし、腐ったリンゴを磨いていたのだから」

languages.text: « C'était leur devoir. Je ne pouvais plus devenir pilote, j'étais la honte de ma lignée. La façon dont ils m'ont traité... Je ne peux pas leur en vouloir. Après tout, ils ont perdu des années en rituels, à entraîner un fruit qui s'est révélé pourri jusqu'à la moelle. »
languages.original_text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

traits.locale_text: « C'était leur devoir. Je ne pouvais plus devenir pilote, j'étais la honte de ma lignée. La façon dont ils m'ont traité... Je ne peux pas leur en vouloir. Après tout, ils ont perdu des années en rituels, à entraîner un fruit qui s'est révélé pourri jusqu'à la moelle. »

languages.text: "Es war ihre Pflicht, das zu tun. Ich war nicht länger geeignet, Pilot zu werden. Ich war eine Schande für meinen ganzen Trupp. Wie sie mit mir umgegangen sind ... Es fällt mir schwer, sie dafür zu verurteilen – jahrelange Rituale und Ausbildung, verschwendet an einen faulen Apfel."
languages.original_text: "It was their duty to do so. I was no longer suitable to become a pilot. I was a disgrace to my entire line. The way they treated me... I struggle to condemn them for it — they had spent years and years of rituals and training on me, burnishing a rotten apple."

traits.locale_text: "Es war ihre Pflicht, das zu tun. Ich war nicht länger geeignet, Pilot zu werden. Ich war eine Schande für meinen ganzen Trupp. Wie sie mit mir umgegangen sind ... Es fällt mir schwer, sie dafür zu verurteilen – jahrelange Rituale und Ausbildung, verschwendet an einen faulen Apfel."
